desc: Lap-It-Up is an exciting new Canadian company with one goal in mind: to create innovative, high quality products for your dog. Whether at home or abroad, Lap-It-Up's customized dog water bottles and pet travel kits make feeding and hydrating your dog easy!

layout.text:
Specially Designed For Dogs & Dog Owners ON THE GO!
Lap-It-Up Dog Water Bottle™ is always ready with a cold drink to rehydrate your dog with clean, safe water.
